SQL.LOAD: SELECT transall_mapping_id, output_mask, layout_code_id, modified_date, modified_by, created_date, created_by, transall_mapping_out_id FROM elp_transall_mapping_out WHERE transall_mapping_out_id = :transall_mapping_out_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT transall_mapping_out_id, transall_mapping_id, output_mask, layout_code_id, modified_date, modified_by, created_date, created_by FROM elp_transall_mapping_out WHERE transall_mapping_id = :transall_mapping_id
SQL.UPDATE: UPDATE elp_transall_mapping_out SET transall_mapping_id = :transall_mapping_id, output_mask = :output_mask, layout_code_id = :layout_code_id, modified_by = :modified_by WHERE transall_mapping_out_id = :transall_mapping_out_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_transall_mapping_out ( transall_mapping_id, output_mask, layout_code_id, created_by, transall_mapping_out_id ) VALUES ( :transall_mapping_id, :output_mask, :layout_code_id, :created_by, :transall_mapping_out_id )
